thread.section_title: Four Seasons Hotel New York - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Weekend Gettaway
thread.title_full: Weekend Gettaway - Review of Four Seasons Hotel New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: craigwU2333LP
title: Weekend Gettaway
text: The overall service of the staff was excellent. The Door Men and Room Service Staff were great. The room was very well maintained. I would like to see "fresh fruit" offered upon arrival as opposed to weeks old fruit that no-one actually wants to eat. However, the technology, cleanliness and overall service was what I would expect for a Four Seasons. The location is superb as well.
